overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active social media presence across multiple platforms including Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky. With a total of 3,580 followers, his content primarily revolves around research in social media analysis, disinformation, and computational methods. Engagement rates vary across platforms, with LinkedIn showing notably high interaction through likes and comments.

contentThemes.description: Updates on new papers, research grants, and findings related to social media analysis.
Posts about hiring and research opportunities in computational social science.
Mentions of upcoming presentations and participation in conferences.

recommendations: Increase the use of visual aids and multimedia in posts to enhance engagement.
Engage more with followers through comments and direct interactions to build a stronger community.

platformInsights.mastodon: Mastodon posts receive moderate engagement; increasing reposts could help in reaching a wider audience.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn shows the highest engagement, particularly for professional and research-related content.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
